com.mygdx.game

Interface JSONable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent, Entity, GameMap, GameObject, LocalPlayer, Player, RemotePlayer, TestAi, Tile

    public interface JSONable
    Author:
    elimonent a child of JSONable can be fully expressed (serialized) in JSON and thus can be read in from or written to JSON

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSONable fromJSON(org.json.simple.JSONObject json)
      this method is not static because then it could not be part of the interface Because this is an instance method, subclasses will usually have some sort of dummy static instance field to call this method from
      org.json.simple.JSONObject toJSON() 

    • Method Detail

      • toJSON

        org.json.simple.JSONObject toJSON()
        Returns:
        a JSON representation of this object

      • fromJSON

        JSONable fromJSON(org.json.simple.JSONObject json)
        this method is not static because then it could not be part of the interface Because this is an instance method, subclasses will usually have some sort of dummy static instance field to call this method from
        Parameters:
        json - the json which contains all of the info needed to construct an object
        Returns:
        the object which was constructed from json
